State.Author: JackArbiter
State.Description: All Optional - AI Overhaul, Stealth Overhaul, Controllable Lowered Weapons, Fall Damage Overhaul, Damage Overhaul, Compass Overhaul, Molotov Overhaul, Grenade Throwing Delay, Grenade Detection Increase
State.Name: Arbitration - Combat AI - Stealth - Speed - Damage - Gameplay Overhaul and Tweaks

State.Author: The Capital Wasteland Team
State.Description: Fallout 4: Point Lookout is a fan recreation of Fallout 3's Point Lookout DLC, fully realized in Fallout 4, including all quests and NPCs.
State.Name: Fallout 4 - Point Lookout

State.Author: LinuX123
State.Description: A small mod that add more effects when you take a damage. Many options.
State.Name: More Noticeable Hit Effect

State.Author: SKK50
State.Description: Quick player respec resets all SPECIAL base values to 1 and removes all base game playable perks, crediting points to reallocate in the perk screen.
State.Name: Quick Player Respec by SKK

State.Author: Sim Settlements Team
State.Description: Chapter 3 finishes the story of Sim Settlements 2. Take your settlements to war, capture non-settlement territories, and gather allies to help you fight back the Gunner Invasion!
State.Name: Sim Settlements 2 - Chapter 3

State.Author: Nyayajp
State.Description:
This mod fixes a bug that increased when UFO4P2.1.5 was applied to Fallout4VR.



1. CTD.

Show next item on workbench.

or when you pick up a Legendary.



Synth Armor

Combat Armor Right Leg

Gatling Laser



2. Some objects in the DLC area will become transparent.

Desk, Chair, Bradburton's Head, and M
State.Name: Unofficial UFO4P VR Fix

State.Author: KOG
State.Description: Formally known as "VR Scope Model Fixes", this mod fixes each weapon to work well in VR without any extra Patches or Fixes.
State.Name: VR Weapon Overhaul

State.Author: DeadPool2099 - Ha_Ru and friends
State.Description: This mod will add Wattz 3000 laser rifle, with all-new lore-friendly design, featuring custom animations, models and textures, inspired by famous Wattz 2000 from Fallout and Fallout 2
State.Name: Wattz Laser Gun

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: This is FallUI - Inventory. A optimized Fallout 4 inventory interface for PC.
State.Name: FallUI - Inventory

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: This is FallUI - Inventory. A optimized Fallout 4 inventory interface for PC.
State.Name: FallUI - Inventory

State.Author: MildlyFootwear
State.Description: Fixes (more or less) the obfuscated dialog choices.
State.Name: Full Dialog VR

State.Author: rux616
State.Description: A highly configurable device that will scrap junk items transferred into its inventory, returning the component parts.
State.Name: Portable Junk Recycler Mk 2

State.Author: CylonSurfer
State.Description: Adds 7 virtual weapon holsters  and new weapon sheathing / equipping system which aims for a more realistic approach forcing the player to return a weapon to the holster it was drawn from before being able to equip another weapon.
State.Name: Virtual Holsters

State.Author: ap05
State.Description:
Burst Impact Blast FX MOD changes the fallout4 particle effect.

Fallout 4 Effect is not cool. So I change it coolly like the latest FPS game.

All the resources I modified are those included in Fallout 4.
State.Name: Burst Impact Blast FX

State.Author: Xazomn
State.Description: Complete Creatures Overhaul HQ & Unique realistic Textures. All created with Photo resources & hand painted.
State.Name: Crows And Creatures

State.Author: rollingrock-alandtse-shizof-CylonSurfer
State.Description: FRIK brings the full player body to life in VR!    Inspired by VRIK from SkyrimVR FRIK aims to bring the same level of immersion of having your body visible to Fallout 4 VR.   Full body Inverse Kinematics has been implemented to animate the arms and legs based on your controller and HMD position.
State.Name: FRIK - Full Player Body with IK

State.Author: Cylon_Surfer
State.Description: Kabuto:VR is an immersive Power Armor helmet replacement mod for 'Fallout 4 VR' which replaces the lackluster semi-transparent Power Armor HUD with a selection of fully enclosed helmets based on the games original helmet meshes - with a little "artistic license". Now includes optional P.A.F.A.S (Power Armor Frame Activation System) Module.
State.Name: Kabuto VR

State.Author: Ceaseless and PDE
State.Description:
This is the All In One pack requested by you all which includes 'Red Rockets Glare REDONE', 'Starlight Drive-In And Diner', 'Bus Stop

Lighting', and 'Illuminated Billboards' (Vanilla and All DLC Version). It is compatible with all other 'Lighting Series' mods that contain their own page, such as 'Radioactive Signs - Lighting'.
State.Name: Lighting Series  - All In One

State.Author: CylonSurfer
State.Description: Expanding on the idea of equipping chems from virtual body slots and using them in a more 'VR Centric' way; Virtual Chems will provide Fallout 4 VR / FRIK players with 5 body slots which can be used to assign and then equip chems from in real time. Once in hand, chems can be virtually inhaled, ingested or injected!
State.Name: Virtual Chems

State.Author: Edmond Noir
State.Description: Complete rebuild of the Automatron Workbench for VR.
State.Name: Edmond's Automatron VR Workbench Rebuild

State.Author: LtCommander
State.Description: The iconic long range weapon of the Fallout Series makes its return as a fully moddable gun in the Commonwealth!
State.Name: DKS-501 Sniper Rifle - Standalone

State.Author: Mortercotic
State.Description: My attempt to improve the audio from Fallout 4. Collection of sound tweaks, fixes and other packs!
State.Name: LOST Audio Tweaks (LAT)

State.Author: asXas
State.Description: Adds the classic Varmint Rifle from Fallout: New Vegas to Fallout 4 with new Animations/Models/Textures.
State.Name: Varmint Rifle - The Return

State.Author: FlashyJoer
State.Description: The next iteration of Advanced Needs, coded from the top-down, to bring the best of AN2 and Fallout 76's many survival systems, with the same level of control over the systems as you are used to.
State.Name: Flashy(JoeR) - Advanced Needs 76

Original.Name: RGrip to interact UI Fix for Oculus-50473-1-0-1614632439.zip

State.Author: Kwiat_W
State.Description: Swaps "A" and "Right Grip" button labels in game's interface, useful for people using Steam Input to swap functionality of these buttons.
State.Name: Right Grip to Interact - UI fix for Oculus controllers

State.Author: kinggath
State.Description:
Framework to open up the settlement system to editing by the community.



For Players: New controls and faster, more stable workshop scripts.



For Modders: Add new resource types, override settings, and generally change the way settlements work dynamically.
State.Name: Workshop Framework

State.Author: jimmygitto
State.Description:
Very simple no-esp model replacer for the Chemistry Stations to make them more immersive for crafting everything.



Also with an ESL-flagged ESP option (doesn't count towards your load order limit) which lets you craft the 4 alternate models.
State.Name: Simple Immersive Chem Benches for Crafting

State.Author: Gmoi
State.Description:
A full retexture for the Pipe Gun series, including the pipe revolver and the Syringer. 

Custom cubemaps for new and improved dirty reflections.

The recon scope is also thrown in as a bonus.
State.Name: Scrap metal and makeshift welds - A Pipe Gun Retexture

State.Author: joycourier
State.Description:
Replaces the Steady Aim perk and changes ranks 2 & 3 of Commando and Heavy Gunner.

Intended for people who remove the concept of 'hipfire' from their games, especially VR.

Also fixes Nuclear Physicist.
State.Name: Hip-Fire Perk Replacers

State.Author: L00
State.Description: The most comprehensive modular weather, lighting and visual overhaul for Fallout 4.
State.Name: NAC X - NATURAL AND ATMOSPHERIC COMMONWEALTH 10 - Legacy Edition

State.Author: CaptainCockerel
State.Description: No more elastic waves in the Commonwealth. Brand new effects and textures with a more realistic motion.
State.Name: WAVE - Wave Animation Vanilla Enhanced

State.Author: archost-rollingrock
State.Description: VR Port of Flat Fallout Disk Cache Enabler
State.Name: Disk Cache Enabler - F4VR

State.Author: jkruse05 with assets from Ha_ru - Navarro - and ngabber
State.Description: The classic hunting rifle from Fallout 1, 2, and Tactics returns... again. This is an overhaul of my old mod, and includes loads of improvements.
State.Name: Rangemaster Remaster (Classic Hunting Rifle)

State.Author: Kassent
State.Description: This is a F4SE plugin which restores some hard-coded features disabled by game in survival mode,for example,unlock console,enable TGM,enable fast travel,restore vanilla compass settings,enalbe quick save and auto save,etc .
State.Name: Unlimited Survival Mode - F4SE

State.Author: AKcelsior
State.Description: Safely removes insignificant objects to improve performance without visual degradation.
State.Name: Insignificant Object Remover

State.Author: The Unofficial Patch Project Team
State.Description: A comprehensive bugfixing mod for Fallout 4. The goal of the Unofficial Fallout 4 Patch (aka UFO4P) is to eventually fix every bug with Fallout 4 not officially resolved by the developers to the limits of the Creation Kit and community-developed tools, in one easy-to-install package.
State.Name: Unofficial Fallout 4 Patch - UFO4P

State.Author: Peregrin0
State.Description: Compatibility patch for Everyone's Best Friend (EBF) and version 2.1.0 of the Unofficial Fallout 4 Patch (UFO4P). Both modify the same Papyrus script files causing one to override the corrections of the other. This mod merges the script changes.
State.Name: EBF UFO4P compatibility fix

State.Author: Cobal
State.Description:
A true Bullet Time V.A.T.S experience in VR. 



The common methods to turn V.A.T.S into bullet time breaks perks and things that are based on hit effects.   

This mod aims to solve those problems and provide proper Bullet Time V.A.T.S in VR.
State.Name: Bullet Time VATS VR

Original.Name: Binaural 3D Surround Sound for Headphones - HRTF-39692-2-4-1645449591.7z

State.Author: kosumosu
State.Description: This mod uses algorithms that can simulate HRTF, allowing for full 3D surround sound with just a normal pair of earphones or headphones.
State.Name: Binaural 3D Surround Sound for Headphones - HRTF

State.Author: The Capital Wasteland Team
State.Description: Fallout 4: Point Lookout is a fan recreation of Fallout 3's Point Lookout DLC, fully realized in Fallout 4, including all quests and NPCs.
State.Name: Fallout 4 - Point Lookout

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: FallUI HUD for Fallout 4 VR improves the in-world displays for usage with Item Sorters.
State.Name: FallUI - HUD VR

State.Author: FlashyJoer
State.Description: The next iteration of Advanced Needs, coded from the top-down, to bring the best of AN2 and Fallout 76's many survival systems, with the same level of control over the systems as you are used to.
State.Name: Flashy(JoeR) - Advanced Needs 76

State.Author: GingasVR
State.Description: Fixes the broken vault door in Vault 111 when using the Unofficial fallout 4 Patch with VR.  UFF4 should now work fully with FOVR
State.Name: Unofficial Fallout 4 VR Fix

State.Author: John3575
State.Description: Remember Fallout 3, where the VATS screech also played when exiting VATS? This mod brings that back.
State.Name: Fallout 3-styled VATS Exit Sound

State.Author: joycourier
State.Description:
I've made adjustments to the spread and recoil of all weapons while still keeping the game balanced (E.G; rifle stocks are still worth it). 

Intended for FO4VR, obviously ruins balance of regular Fallout 4.
State.Name: Weapon Accuracy Redone for VR

State.Author: dm
State.Description: Bypasses the plugin file version check to allow using older EXEs with newer plugin files. (.esm, .esl, .esp)
State.Name: Fallout 4 Version Check Patcher

State.Author: mith077
State.Description:
Fallout 4 VR Compatibility Patch for large scale world expansion: Fallout 4 - Point Lookout.



Includes missing ground fix, un-extended dialogues, general freeze and CTD fixes.
State.Name: Fallout 4 VR Compatibility Patch for Point Lookout

State.Author: Androl
State.Description: This mod tweaks water settings to make water more physically accurate, removing the fake water color and increasing the brightness of real reflections.
State.Name: Reflective Water

State.Author: mith077
State.Description:
Fill last few gaps between Fallout 4 VR and NAC X - NATURAL AND ATMOSPHERIC COMMONWEALTH 10 - Legacy Edition.



CTD fix for Rad Weather, rain particle adjustment, flashlight patch and others.
State.Name: Fallout 4 VR Compatibility Patch for NAC X

State.Author: Maduin81
State.Description: Fixes a variety of compatibility issues when using DLC on the VR version of the game.
State.Name: DLCVR - Fallout 4 VR and DLC  standalone bug fixes

State.Author: fadingsignal
State.Description: FO4 Particle Patch is a comprehensive mod that updates hundreds of mesh and material files to make fog, smoke, water, blood, dirt puffs, dust (and much more) glow in the dark less, and better utilize ambient & point lighting. Also improves distance rendering for Far Harbor fog effects.
State.Name: Fallout 4 Particle Patch - No More Glowing Objects

State.Author: FlashyJoer
State.Description: The next iteration of Advanced Needs, coded from the top-down, to bring the best of AN2 and Fallout 76's many survival systems, with the same level of control over the systems as you are used to.
State.Name: Flashy(JoeR) - Advanced Needs 76

State.Author: Sirb Willy
State.Description: Bloodworm MoleRats Scorpions Bugfix Nukaworld (Mad Mulligan's mine) Shamrock Taphouse and Vault81Savefreeze Fix
State.Name: No BloodWorm MoleRats Scorpions Teleport-BugFix

State.Author: Seb263
State.Description:
Weapons of Fate is a mod that makes bullets behave in a more interesting and realistic manner.



Each bullet has unique characteristics that are combined to determine the trajectory that the bullet will follow.

Also, bullets no longer dissapear after a certain distance, instead losing in altitude until their point of impact.
State.Name: Weapons of Fate (Ballistics Overhaul)

State.Author: KhaoMaat
State.Description: Centers loading screen elements in VR and provides a number of options to customize the appearance.
State.Name: Customizable Loading Screen VR

State.Author: mith077
State.Description:
Fallout 4 VR Compatibility Patch for large scale world expansion: Fallout 4 - Point Lookout.



Includes missing ground fix, un-extended dialogues, general freeze and CTD fixes.
State.Name: Fallout 4 VR Compatibility Patch for Point Lookout

Original.Name: FallUI Item Sorter for VR (English only - no DLCs)-51556-1-0-1618845506.rar

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: FallUI HUD for Fallout 4 VR improves the in-world displays for usage with Item Sorters.
State.Name: FallUI - HUD VR

Original.Name: Fog Remover II ESL (Main) v2.2 Installer-31976-2-2-1671214076.7z

State.Author: 3 Gouls and a Supermutant
State.Description: Fog Remover II improves the games appearance and performance by removing Interior Fog, Mist, Steam, Dust, Smoke and Airborne Debris. Featuring the new "Interior Fog Remover" option / standalone mod.
State.Name: Fog Remover - Performance Enhancer II

Original.Name: Reflective Water - DLC (Requires Far Harbor and Nuka World)-34419-1-0.zip

State.Author: Androl
State.Description: This mod tweaks water settings to make water more physically accurate, removing the fake water color and increasing the brightness of real reflections.
State.Name: Reflective Water

State.Author: Antonix35
State.Description:
Untie the game speed from the framerate. Fixes physical bugs. Reduces loading time.

Now there is a separate version for VR.
State.Name: High FPS Physics Fix

State.Author: Mangaclub
State.Description: This mod aims to overhaul the Water textures, reflections, opacity, specularity and general look of the water in Fallout 4 to be more realistic and water like.
State.Name: Vivid Waters - a Water overhaul for Fallout 4

Original.Name: DEF_UI Iconlibs Rescaled and Fixed - Colored-31088-1-6-1575705975.7z

State.Author: Phlunder
State.Description: Aims to bring consistency in design and coloring to the icon library. Also fixes various issues with icon sizes, bounding boxes, and scaling.
State.Name: DEF_UI Iconlibs Rescaled and Fixed

State.Author: boring3
State.Description:
Elevate the CPU Priority of the game process.

Increase FPS and Prevent stutters caused by other processes.
State.Name: Fallout Priority - CPU Performance FPS Optimizer

State.Author: mith077
State.Description:
Fill last few gaps between Fallout 4 VR and Sim Settlements 2.



Manual assignment, settlement resource viewer and others.
State.Name: Fallout 4 VR Compatibility Patch for Sim Settlements 2

State.Author: SpringHeelJon
State.Description: Makes Fallout less annoying to play by fixing bugged perks, making underused perks viable and automating low skill actions.
State.Name: Perk Up - Lightweight Perk Overhaul

State.Author: Subleader and Egorprotonov
State.Description: This mod adds the Model 11 shotgun to Fallout 4 with a lot of customization and leveled list. Fully compatible with BCR and Tactical Reload.
State.Name: Remington Model 11 - Shotgun

State.Author: Zazuban
State.Description:
Tired of Dogmeat acting like an oversize chihuahua? This mod fixes that and more, turning your wasteland best friend into the companion he was supposed to be!



Large balances and changes available in the new 1.3 version; download now!
State.Name: Dogmeat - A True Companion

State.Author: PureDark
State.Description: My plugin for bridging DLSS/FSR2/XeSS.
State.Name: UpscalerBasePlugin

State.Author: PureDark
State.Description: F4SE Plugin to use DLSS/FSR2/XeSS in Fallout 4 VR.
State.Name: Fallout4 Upscaler VR - DLSS FSR2 XeSS

State.Author: Cobal
State.Description: A Flashlight like light mod for your pipboy in VR.
State.Name: PipBoy VR light

State.Author: NexusAU and gir489
State.Description:
A Holotape Cheat Menu that lets you add Caps, Stimpaks, any of the Crafting Materials, SPECIAL Points and More!

Also available for Xbox One on Bethesda.net
State.Name: Cheat Terminal

State.Author: SpringHeelJon
State.Description: Lightweight lighting aims to be an all in one simple Vanilla + Lighting overhaul. All while being as compatible as can be with no cell edits.
State.Name: Lightweight Lighting - A weather and interior lighting overhaul

State.Author: Ablaze666
State.Description: This small mod fixes the exaggerated shine of specific objects while it's raining.
State.Name: Wetness Shader Fix

State.Author: Dank Rafft
State.Description: Since the original mod has some flaws (missing master and wild edits) which could lead to an automatically deactivating mod or unnecessary mod conflicts I decided to recreate it. V2 also includes easy hacking.
State.Name: Easy Lockpicking and Hacking

State.Author: Degenerate Dak
State.Description: Lore friendly little pistol mod with tons of customization and leveled list integration.
State.Name: Frommer Stop Pistol

State.Author: SKK50
State.Description: FastStart a new game in less than 2 minutes from Main menu > Looks menu > SPECIAL menu > Outside Vault 111 with most mod added inventory items. This is a scripted bypass, not a static savegame so you get full player customisation and fresh RNG.
State.Name: SKK Fast Start new game

State.Author: Terenor82
State.Description: small Tweak/Workaround for the DC and Goodneighbor Crash caused by LODs
State.Name: VR LOD Crash Workaround

State.Author: rollingrock
State.Description: Better Scopes VR does away with the awful VR scope interface and works together with the See Through Scopes mod to bring more realistic and immersive scopes to the VR version of Fallout 4!  Main features are fully functional collimated sights and VR zoom feature based on scope maginification.
State.Name: Better Scopes VR

State.Author: XLSJ
State.Description: Allows bullet holes and other impact effects to be shown at long ranges. Made with FO4Edit.
State.Name: Long Range Bullet Holes

State.Author: Topol774
State.Description: Smaller 10mm pistol model, reduced muzzle flash and fixed reflex sights.
State.Name: Resized 10mm Pistol Reworked

State.Author: frazaman
State.Description:
Create Fallout 4 VR mods based on VR controller input events

Supports PapyrusVR and C++/F4SEVR API
State.Name: Fallout4 VR Tools

State.Author: Valdacil
State.Description: This mod allows you to have Dogmeat and a standard companion at the same time using in game functionality (not hacks or console commands).
State.Name: Everyone's Best Friend (Dogmeat and Companion At Same Time - No Console - No Hack)

State.Author: alandtse
State.Description:
It's like buffout but for the engine. This provides various engine fixes and a crashlogger. This is a NG port of Fudgyduff's MIT source code. 



NG comes from Skyrim modding and means one dll for multiple versions of the game. So this dll should work in flat and VR.
State.Name: Buffout 4 NG with PDB support

State.Author: alandtse
State.Description:
VR Address Library database for end users. This is intended as a VR replacement for Address Library for F4SE for mods designed for it. Only download if the mod says this is a requirement. It is currently an alpha.



This is not for Fallout4. This is different from Address Library for F4SE.
State.Name: VR Address Library for F4SEVR

State.Author: LeahTheUnknown
State.Description: Because you don't make clothes with Chemistry.  Not associated with the popular Crafting Workbenches mod.
State.Name: Chemistry Station Renamed Crafting Workbench

State.Author: Kwiat_W
State.Description: Altered zoom level, zoom out further, coloured quest indicators, lowered joystick sensitivity.
State.Name: Map Tweaks VR

Original.Name: VR FPS Stabilizer for Fallout VR-65961-v1-0-1a-1671305025.zip

State.Author: rollingrock-shizof
State.Description: Commonlib port of Shizof's VR FPS Stabilizer for Fallout 4 VR!  This mod changes ini settings automatically to keep your framerate at target levels.
State.Name: VR FPS Stabilizer - Fallout

State.Author: Gmoi
State.Description:
A full retexture for the Pipe Gun series, including the pipe revolver and the Syringer. 

Custom cubemaps for new and improved dirty reflections.

The recon scope is also thrown in as a bonus.
State.Name: Scrap metal and makeshift welds - A Pipe Gun Retexture

State.Author: Niero
State.Description: Adds the classic American plinker, the Ruger Mk pistol, with some Fallout twists and loads of customization.
State.Name: CROSS_RugerMkV

State.Author: Oynlen
State.Description: This mod will add a dense pine forest environment.
State.Name: Another Pine Forest Mod

State.Author: CaptainCockerel
State.Description: FAR optimises and improves over six thousand distant land textures, which means more perfomance and less stutter.
State.Name: FAR - Faraway Area Reform

State.Author: SpringHeelJon
State.Description: Balances the environmental effects on all base game and DLC transparent material files.
State.Name: Gloomy Glass - All transparent materials revised

State.Author: Thaylar
State.Description: Electricity is still out there, why not light up the wasteland a little bit?  Street Lamp Illuminations Galore!  Adds approximately 813 lights to street lamps, billboard signs, or other decorative lights in the Commonwealth and Far Harbor.
State.Name: Wasteland Illumination

State.Author: kinggath
State.Description:
Framework to open up the settlement system to editing by the community.



For Players: New controls and faster, more stable workshop scripts.



For Modders: Add new resource types, override settings, and generally change the way settlements work dynamically.
State.Name: Workshop Framework

State.Author: DeathWrench
State.Description: The specular maps originally present on hair are buggy when under certain lighting. So I tracked them down and "deleted" them by making them invisible, it doesn't fix it completely but it does help mitigate it a lot. New version that doesn't edit textures at all, but the material file, produces the same results.
State.Name: Hair Specular Map Removal Thingy

Original.Name: Faster Terminal Displays (20x) Creation Kit Version-937-3-0.zip

State.Author: Old Nick
State.Description: Speeds up the text display on terminals
State.Name: Faster Terminal Displays
